Rainy_Day_0: I hope that Randy isn't out in the rain.$7#$b#His body isn't prepared for that...$7
Rainy_Day_1: Clean your shoes before entering the house again.#$b# Last time you let some dirty footsteps.$a#$b# But I still love you.$l
Rainy_Day_2: I went out and started watering some crops for you.#$b# But when I started, I realized that it was raining...$h#$b# Now I'm wet...$7#$b# Well at least our crops don't need to be watered!$h
Rainy_Day_3: Luck that I closed the windows in the night.#$b# So we don't have water here inside.$h
Rainy_Day_4: In days like these, I like to take a good coffee, sit on a chair next to the window...$h#$b# And just look at the rain.#$b# I wish that you could stop by a while and do the same.$h
Rainy_Night_0: I left some clothes in the rain...$7#$b# Now at the night that I remembered.$7
Rainy_Night_1: Oh dear, finally my husband is back. Don't pass that much time in the rain outside.^Oh dear, finally my wife is back. Don't pass that much time in the rain outside.
Rainy_Night_2: Here honey, I made this for you. It feels better when it's raining.[614]
Rainy_Night_3: Honey, I was horrified if you could get sick. Thanks, Yoba that you're ok.$h
Rainy_Night_4: Honey, go rest. Working on the rain isn't good for you.#$e# I love you...$l
Indoor_Day_0: If you go to the Town, say hi to Gunther and Randy to me.#$b# I hope that they are ok there.$7
Indoor_Day_1: Good morning honey.#$b# I made this for you. It isn't much, but I hope that you like it.[195]$l
Indoor_Day_2: Hey honey, come closer...$l#$b#*kiss*#$b# I love you, please take care.$l
Indoor_Day_3: I love living here at the farm with you my dear...$l
Indoor_Day_4: Today I'll clean the house, and you can take care of the farm.#$e# Oh, I almost forgot! If you go to the city, bring a coffee for me if you can.
Indoor_Night_0: How was your day dear?#$b# Mine was good here, I saw some animals running around here.$h
Indoor_Night_1: Thank you for being you.$l#$b# I feel good here with you...$l#$e# %kiss
Indoor_Night_2: Hi honey, I made dinner for you.$l#$b# It isn't the best thing ever, but I made it with love...[610 609 196]$l
Indoor_Night_3: Honey, I missed you.$l#$b# Tomorrow, I take care of the house, and you get some rest.#$b# I love you so much!$l
Indoor_Night_4: Honey, have you seemed Randy today?#$b# I miss him a little...$7
Outdoor_0: I like to stay here and just see the farm.#$b# It's beautiful!$h
Outdoor_1: Sometimes I wake up and think that I'm still dreaming...#$b# But then I come out and see this beautiful farm.#$b# Thank you for making me happy dear...$l
Outdoor_3: I woke up early today, and cleaned the house.#$b# So you don't have to worry about this, and can just take care of the farm.$h#$b# And of me...$l

OneKid_1: I hope that %kid1 grow healthy and be a farmer like you!$h

TwoKids_0: %kid1 and %kid2 are our little precious kids...$l
